item.title: About me
item.description: English teacher by profession, computer expert by passion. I’m an advocate and user of open source software. I firmly believe in lifelong learning. That’s why I read books on different topics: from history to astrophysics. Employment The John Paul II Catholic University of Lublin (10.2009 - present) Teacher of English / IT English classes (General, Business English, English for IT) Information Technology classes Web Design classes (HTML, CSS, WordPress) Education The John Paul II Catholic University of Lublin (2010 - 2012) Computer science, postgraduate
